channel.title: Active Learning on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Active Learning on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Active Classification with Few Queries under Misspecification
item.description: Learning halfspaces efficiently under noise is cracked! A novel query language enables a polylog query algorithm for Massart noise, overcoming previous limitations.

item.title: Learning Noisy Halfspaces with a Margin: Massart is No Harder than Random
item.description: Proper learning of noisy halfspaces with margins is achievable with sample complexity matching random classification noise, defying prior expectations.
